data.lyric:
[ti:Run Rudolph Run]
[ar:Chuck Berry]
[al:The Best of Rock & Roll, Vol. 2: Chuck Berry]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Run Rudolph Run - Chuck Berry (查克·贝里)
[00:07.50]Out of all the reindeers you know you're the mastermind
[00:09.98]
[00:13.50]Run run rudolph randalph ain't too far behind
[00:16.52]
[00:19.89]Run run rudolph santa's got to make it to town
[00:22.96]
[00:25.97]Santa make him hurry tell him he can take the freeway down
[00:29.07]
[00:32.13]Run run rudolph 'cause I'm reelin' like a merry go round
[00:35.56]
[00:38.21]Said santa to a boy child what have you been longing for
[00:41.36]
[00:44.93]All I want for christmas is a rock and roll electric guitar
[00:48.34]
[00:50.58]And then away went rudolph a whizzing like a shooting star
[00:53.95]
[00:57.34]Run run rudolph santa's got to make it to town
[01:00.81]
[01:03.70]Santa make him hurry tell him he can take the freeway down
[01:06.79]
[01:10.33]Run run rudolph reeling like a merry go round
[01:12.71]
[01:35.27]Run run rudolph santa's got to make it to town
[01:38.69]
[01:41.63]Santa make him hurry tell him he can take the freeway down
[01:44.49]
[01:47.88]Run run rudolph  I'm reelin' like a merry go round
[01:51.08]
[01:53.96]Said santa to a girl child what would please you most to get
[01:57.51]
[02:00.55]A little baby doll that can cry sleep drink and wet
[02:03.40]
[02:06.46]And then away went rudolph  whizzing like a saber jet
[02:09.72]
[02:13.25]Run run rudolph santa's got to make it to town
[02:16.50]
[02:19.75]Santa make him hurry tell him he can take the freeway down
[02:22.42]
[02:25.88]Run run rudolph  I'm reelin' like a merry go round
data.trans:
[ti:Run Rudolph Run]
[ar:Chuck Berry]
[al:The Best of Rock & Roll, Vol. 2: Chuck Berry]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.50]你在驯鹿群里出类拔萃 你知道你是首领
[00:09.98]
[00:13.50]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 兰道夫离你不远了了
[00:16.52]
[00:19.89]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[00:22.96]
[00:25.97]圣诞老人让他加快速度 告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[00:29.07]
[00:32.13]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 因为我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[00:35.56]
[00:38.21]圣诞老人对一个男孩说 孩子 你一直在期待什么
[00:41.36]
[00:44.93]我圣诞节想要的礼物是一把摇滚电吉他
[00:48.34]
[00:50.58]然后鲁道夫像流星一样嗖嗖地消失不见
[00:53.95]
[00:57.34]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[01:00.81]
[01:03.70]圣诞老人让他加快速度 告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[01:06.79]
[01:10.33]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[01:12.71]
[01:35.27]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[01:38.69]
[01:41.63]圣诞老人让他加快速度 告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[01:44.49]
[01:47.88]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[01:51.08]
[01:53.96]圣诞老人对一个女孩说 你最想要的礼物是什么
[01:57.51]
[02:00.55]一个可爱的洋娃娃 能哭会睡 像人一样栩栩如生
[02:03.40]
[02:06.46]鲁道夫转身离开 像喷气飞机一样掠过天际
[02:09.72]
[02:13.25]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[02:16.50]
[02:19.75]圣诞老人让他加快速度 告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[02:22.42]
[02:25.88]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
